member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.AI.Evaluation.Quality.CoherenceEvaluator
member.summary: An that evaluates the 'Coherence' of a response produced by an AI model.
Evaluates the supplied modelResponse and returns an containing one or more s.
member.param: The conversation history including the request that produced the supplied modelResponse.
The response that is to be evaluated.
A that specifies the that should be used if one or more composed s use an AI model to perform evaluation.
Additional contextual information (beyond that which is available in messages) that the may need to accurately evaluate the supplied modelResponse.
A that can cancel the evaluation operation.
member.returns: An containing one or more s.
